r.s: Package to access and query CDDB audio-CD servers
r.d: The Net_CDDB class is used to access CDDB audio-CD servers via different protocols. The class can get detailed audio-CD data (track names, artist names, album name, etc.) from the CDDB server for a given audio CD.
r.n: * Fixed bug #7526, incorrect formatted disc length (Kristof) * Fixed bug #7592, incorrect parsing of multi-line track/artist/disc titles (Kristof, Richard) * Added Net_CDDB_Track class and made neccessary changes to Net_CDDB_Disc * Net_CDDB_Disc::toString() no longer increments the revision number * Changed Net_CDDB class to Net_CDDB_Client (Net_CDDB is an abstract base class now) * Added Net_CDDB_Server class (CDDB server *alpha quality code, use at your own risk!*) * Fixed package.xml dependency list * Added distinction between CDDB categories vs. CDDB genres * Added new protocol: Filesystem (query from downloaded copy of the entire FreeDB database) * Added a useful Net_CDDB_Utilities class which holds misc. useful static methods * Re-written parseRecord() method (better compatibility, cleaner, bug fixes, type checking)
